name: Gitorious - Use default monospace font
description:
The CSS for code blocks in Gitorious specifies several nice monospace Windows and Mac fonts, but no common Linux font; most importantly, before falling back to the generic monospace, it tries the hideous Courier New, that makes the whole site unreadable.

This style simply sets the <pre> blocks to a generic monospace, that hopefully is set in the system preferences to a nice, readable monospace font
